com.smartnsoft.droid4me

Class LifeCycle.BusinessObjectUnavailableException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.LifeCycle.BusinessObjectUnavailableException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing interface:
    LifeCycle

    public static class LifeCycle.BusinessObjectUnavailableException
extends java.lang.Exception
    This exception should be triggered on the framework methods which allow to throw it, when a business object is not accessible.
    See Also:
